MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the  LL68 and LL69 postcode area of Amlwch and Penysarn, affecting properties in Amlwch, Penysarn and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  5:34PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on the overhead line network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 8:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:51PM on 4th December 2020.
